summary: DOD spent, or planned to spend, $9.1 billion on IT business programs in FYs 2022-24. In our annual assessment, we reviewed 21 of those programs and found 10 are developing software and using an Agile approach. This is an iterative development process in which software is delivered in increments throughout the project, letting program staff catch errors quickly and get continual user feedback. But 4...
title: IT Systems Annual Assessment: DOD Needs to Strengthen Software Metrics and Address Continued Cybersecurity and Reporting Gaps
